Black Sands Reminimixed:

01 - Black Sands Reminimixed


Bonobo's Black Sands was a record I actually ran quite a bit, w/ some of my faves being Kiara, Stay The Same as well as the title track. But to see a remixed full length come out?? #FTW. So, we have a Black Sands Remixed teaser 12" dropping for the tastemakers 1st in late Jan, with the album dropping Feb 13th 2012 in UK and 1 week later in US. Invited on remix duties the likes of Lapalux, Cosmin TRG, Eglo's Floating Points & ARP 101, all world Mark Pritchard, Mike Slott, Blue Daisy and who might the hardest working dude right now, Lucky Me's
